name: Dungeon's Champion
description:
Dungeon's Champion is a 3D game based on fighting monsters. Your goal is to get to the treasure to finish the level. Pickup power-ups to be stronger and faster.

Special thanks to these creators (without them the project wouldn't exist):

3D models by Quaternius:

  • http://quaternius.com/
  • https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjSthHe1Wxash3mnDCS2XYA

Music by Evan King [Enchridion]:

  • https://www.twitter.com/evankingaudio
  • https://www.evankingmusic.com/
  • https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio

Have fun!

Keep in mind that this is my first game and even though i have been working on it for couple of months it still has some small glitches.
